name: TasteNest
description: TasteNest is a modern food-ordering web application built with a Django backend and React frontend, leveraging Redux for state management. Users can browse dishes, manage cart contents, reserve tables, and complete checkout flows—ensuring a seamless, responsive experience across devices.

name: Prameyshala
description: PrameyShala is an innovative educational technology platform aimed at assisting students in their academic pursuits, enabling them to succeed in their studies and achieve their educational goals.

name: Chowdeck - Landing Page
description: Chowdeck – a sleek landing page clone crafted from Figma, showcasing modern design and responsive UI.

name: Advisor
description: Advisor gives random advices by the use of Advice Slip JSON API.
